name: vscoq-html-views
description: HTML views for the display of goals and other feedback for the Coq Proof Assistant

scripts.compile: tsc -p src/goals && tsc -p src/ltacprof && shx mkdir -p ../client/html_views/{goals,ltacprof,jquery} && shx cp src/goals/*.{css,html} ../client/html_views/goals && shx cp src/ltacprof/*.html ../client/html_views/ltacprof  && shx cp jquery/**/*.js ../client/html_views/jquery
